translations: n.联合，统一；联合的行为、实例或过程

phrs.translation: 意大利统一, 义大利统一运动, 详细翻译
利比里亚统一党, 还有利比里亚统一党, 利比里亚的统一
统一部, 国土统一院, 详细翻译
法律的统一, 法律统一

sentences.sentence: With unification, East Germany was subsumed by capitalist West Germany.
sentences.translation: 统一后，东德被归入资本主义的西德。

sentences.sentence: The controversy has arisen over the text of the preamble to the unification treaty.
sentences.translation: 就统一条约的序文措词出现了争论。

sentences.sentence: Germany has made great progress at finding its place in the world since unification, but it is not yet over the hump of history.
sentences.translation: 自两德统一以来，德国在寻找自己在世界上的位置方面取得了巨大的进步，但它还没有走出历史的低谷。
